name: London Royal Castles with Westminster Abbey Visit
description: Beginning in the fashionable area of Covent Garden, this is the perfect tour to begin your trip in London, as we guide you around the top attractions to see in the city! Stroll through Trafalgar Square and past London’s most expensive apartment as you watch the 400 year old Changing of the Guards ceremony take place outside Buckingham Palace. Your day is only just starting, as you go on to see three more Royal castles and palaces across the capital.
